venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
Can you believe I've never seen Reservoir Dogs? It's back in theaters for one day only, December 4 2012. Let's meetup at Blackstone Valley Cinema in Millbury.

The plot: I think it's about 5 guys in colored suits rescuing some puppies from a reservoir. Or it's a violent heist movie by Quentin Tarantino.

Let's meet in the lobby at 6:30. If you need to reach my, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Reservoir Dogs - 20th Anniversary Edition
